def transform(sequence):
    six_index = sequence.index('6')
    left_side = ''.join(sorted(sequence[:six_index]))
    right_side = sequence[six_index:]
    return left_side+right_side

def transform(sequence):
    six_index = sequence.index('6')
    left_side = ''.join(sorted(sequence[:six_index]))
    right_side = sequence[six_index:]
    return left_side+right_side
